description: a(n) = least k>1 such that k^n divides k!.
comments: For n >= 2, least k such that A011776(k)=n.
references: Ivan Niven, Herbert S. Zuckerman and Hugh L. Montgomery, An Introduction to the Theory Of Numbers, Fifth Edition, John Wiley and Sons, Inc., NY 1991.
J. Roberts, Lure of the Integers, Math. Assoc. America, 1992, p. 251.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..345
Index entries for sequences related to factorial numbers
crossrefs: See A133481 for a better version. Cf. A011776, A011778.
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
